description.p: You have spent your life protecting someone elseâ€™s. Perhaps it was a noble, or a powerful crime boss; maybe even a brutal warlord. Maybe instead of someone more powerful than you, it was a physically weaker companion or family member. Whatever the case, your life up to this point has been focused around protecting someone.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Medicine and either Insight or Survival
Equipment: A symbol or keepsake from from someone you saved, Healer's Kit, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

description.p: Your time in the miltary has earned you the respect of soldiers and doctors alike. Soldiers will view you favorably and medical workers will give you a discount on supplies.
